NG0149:1: ngo mtshar du ma bcas nas 'thon par gyur to //
NG0149:2: 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so //
NG0149:3: de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phat ces bsgrags pas /
NG0149:4: thams cad khros nas ma mo thams cad kyang rang
NG0149:5: rang gi gnas ga la ba der yud tsam gyis
NG0149:6: phyin par bkye'o // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes
NG0149:7: pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag
NG0149:8: kun thugs rje chen po bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes
NG0149:9: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
NG0149:10: phyin par bkye'o // / sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo *//
NG0149:11: om badzra ma ha a mr-i ta ma ha kro d+ha am am am zhes brjod pas /
NG0149:12: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad /
NG0149:13: bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gis bsnams nas bton te /
NG0149:14: mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtshor chud pa las
NG0149:15: bsnams nas u tsush+ma kro d+ha phyung nas 'dam kun
NG0149:16: 'thungs te dran pa slar rnyed nas /
NG0149:17: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya phyag stong brgyad brgya /
NG0149:19: sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor na bzhugs par mthong ngo *//
NG0149:20: de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid
NG0149:21: pa kun du dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul
NG0149:22: ba'i thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par so
NG0149:23: sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul lo //
NG0149:24: de nas de dag shin tu 'dar zhing bred pa rab tu zhum pa'i nga ros /
NG0149:27: 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na //
NG0149:28: mgo dang lus ni brgyar 'gas shing *//
NG0149:29: snying yang 'gas shing gtubs gyur cig / rul myags tshig nas brlag pa dang */
NG0149:30: dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog / ces 'bangs su mchi par mna' bor nas //
NG0149:31: dkyil 'khor gyis gdan du bzhag go / thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang smras pa /
NG0149:32: bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang *//
NG0149:33: ma dang bu mo sring mo rnams //
NG0149:34: dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol //
NG0149:35: dpa' bo lha rje bzhes su gsol //
NG0149:36: bdag cag so so 'khor bcas kyi //
NG0149:38: ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yang *//
NG0149:39: gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar //
NG0149:40: g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pa'i //
NG0149:41: sems kyis blangs nas spyi bo yi //
NG0149:42: gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur bar bgyi //
NG0149:43: de yi dgos pa ci yang rung *//
NG0149:44: ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub //
NG0149:45: gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga 'dir //
NG0149:46: smras pa bzhin du ma bsgrubs na //
NG0149:47: bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying *//
NG0149:48: bkas gtubs dum bur rul bar mchi'o //
NG0149:50: de nas de dag gi chung ma'i tshogs dang */
NG0149:51: ma dang sring mo dang bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dkyil 'khor du yud tsam gyis @#//
NG0149:53: thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa /
NG0149:54: bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kun //
NG0149:55: dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi //
NG0149:56: dpa' bo chen pos bdag cag la //
NG0149:57: las kyi dngos grub rtsal du gsol //
NG0149:59: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lag
NG0149:60: tu rdo rje byin nas ming gi dbang bskur te
NG0149:61: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bkod do //
NG0149:62: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
NG0149:63: las khro bo rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin
NG0149:64: rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o ///
NG0149:65: / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos
NG0149:66: dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig
NG0149:67: gis grub par bya ba'i phyir //
NG0149:68: de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo khrag 'thung chen po
NG0149:69: btsun mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs de dag gi sku
NG0149:70: dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rngam pa
NG0149:71: las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo *//
NG0149:72: om sarba ta tha ga ta ma ha shri he
NG0149:73: ru ka / ma ha tsan+da sarba dush+tan+ta ka ha
NG0149:74: na da ha pa tsa hum hum hum phat /
NG0149:75: om badzra ma ha shri he ru ka ma ha
NG0149:76: tsan+da sarba dush+tan+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa
NG0149:78: om rat+na ma ha shri he ru ka ma ha
NG0149:79: tsan+da sarba dush+tan+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa
NG0149:81: om pad+ma ma ha shri he ru ka ma ha
NG0149:82: tsan+da sarba dush+tan+ta ka ha na da ha tsa hum
NG0149:83: hum hum phat / o+om karma ma ha shri he
NG0149:84: ru ka ma ha tsan+da sarba dush+tan+ta ka ha na
NG0149:85: da ha pa tsa hum hum hum phat /
NG0149:86: om sarba ta tha ga ta ma ha kro d+hi shwa ri sarba dush+tan hum phat //
NG0149:87: om ma ha badzra d+ha ra ma ha kro d+hi shwa ri dzra la ni hum phat /
NG0149:88: om ma ha sur+ya rat+na ma ha kro d+hi shwa ri bi da ma hum phat /
NG0149:89: om hri shrut+ta sa man+ta pad+ma ma ha kro d+hi shwa ri kha hi hum phat /
NG0149:90: om sarba a mo g+ha ma ha kro d+hi shwa ri bi shwa hum phat /
NG0149:94: 'di sam skr-i ta dang bstun na cung zad the
NG0149:95: tshom du snang yang rgyud las sam skr-i ta kho
NG0149:96: na'i nges pa med pas rong zom gyi gsungs bzhin
NG0149:97: bcos nas rgod mar bsgyur ba'o //
NG0149:104: badzra bya g+h+ri mu khi he /
NG0149:105: badzra sr-ing+ga la mu khi he /
NG0149:106: badzra shwa na mu khi he /
NG0149:107: badzra gr-i d+ha mu khi he /
NG0149:109: badzra ka ka mu kha he /
NG0149:110: badzra u lu ka mu khi he /
NG0149:111: om badzra ar+ya te dza te da dzah om badzra a mu kha hum /
NG0149:113: om badzra b+hasmi ba la ya ba du to hoh b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NG0149:114: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NG0149:115: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NG0149:116: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NG0149:118: om ru lu ru lu hum /
NG0149:119: e h+ye hi a na ya /
NG0149:121: om badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hum /
NG0149:122: om khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa //
NG0149:123: thugs rje khro dbal rngam pa'i tshogs //
NG0149:124: 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che //
NG0149:125: de nyid du ni bdag la stsol //
NG0149:126: om badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NG0149:127: om badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya phat /
NG0149:128: om badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoh /
NG0149:129: a li u li ha li ta pa li /
NG0149:131: kha ram yo gi ni kha hi hoh / glu 'di zur chag gi skad @#//
NG0149:132: yin par rong zom chos bzang bzhed ces lo chen bsod nams rgya mtshos gsung */
NG0149:135: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu+u thams cad tshig /
NG0149:136: rab tu tshig / kun du tshig go / 'bar
NG0149:139: thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang rab tu gang */
NG0149:140: kun du gang bar gyur tau //
NG0149:141: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
NG0149:142: las khro bo'i tshogs chen po'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor
NG0149:143: spros pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o // // de
NG0149:144: nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos /
NG0149:145: de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
NG0149:147: gru chad bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
NG0149:148: gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan //
NG0149:149: 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes //
NG0149:150: thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid //
NG0149:151: 'bar ba'i 'phrau ba mang po 'khrug / khyu mchog
NG0149:152: ma he gzig dang stag / gtum pa dom gyi
NG0149:153: sbar bas ni // dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung *//
NG0149:154: smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang *//
NG0149:155: dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku //
NG0149:156: dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad //
NG0149:157: ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon //
NG0149:158: rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs //
NG0149:159: sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zla'i chas //
NG0149:160: stong gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas //
NG0149:161: rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang */
NG0149:162: ral gri dgra sta gshol la sogs //
NG0149:163: rang gi lag cha sna tshogs te //
NG0149:165: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang */
NG0149:166: sgo bzhi'i phyag rgyas rab mdzes shing *//
NG0149:167: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
NG0149:168: bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes //
NG0149:169: rang gi stan dang lag cha dang *//
NG0149:170: ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas //
NG0149:172: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to //
NG0149:173: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
NG0149:174: las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
NG0149:175: bdun pa'o /// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes
NG0149:176: pa chen po'i mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen po 'di
NG0149:178: de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni //
NG0149:179: thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral //
NG0149:180: de nas gnyis med blo yis ni //
NG0149:181: blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje //
NG0149:182: gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya'o //
NG0149:183: 'khril pa'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas //
NG0149:184: bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya //
NG0149:185: mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag / bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul //
NG0149:186: bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo / longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni //
NG0149:188: phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi //
NG0149:189: bde gshegs yon tan rmad po che //
NG0149:190: gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin na //
NG0149:191: lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos //
NG0149:194: phyag rgya chen po rdzogs 'gyur zhing *//
NG0149:195: gsal la yid gnyis med pa na //
NG0149:198: mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par gyur tau //
NG0149:199: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
NG0149:200: las mchod sbyin dam pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bco
NG0149:201: brgyad pa'o /// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes
NG0149:202: pa chen pos sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya
NG0149:203: ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po 'di ched du brjod
NG0149:204: brgyad pa'o /// do // bla med theg par rab nges na //
NG0149:205: nyon mongs las rnams kun spyod kyang *//
NG0149:206: byas la mi sogs tshogs 'gyur te //
NG0149:207: tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs //
NG0149:208: bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu //
NG0149:209: 'dul ba'i dbang gis tshul khrims dang *//
NG0149:210: ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa //
NG0149:211: ma lus kun 'das rnam par dag / yod med dbu ma mi dmigs shing *//
NG0149:212: sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul //
NG0149:213: srog med srog kyang gcad du med //
NG0149:214: srog dang skyes bu log rtog tsam //
NG0149:215: bden pa gnyis ka dbyer med pas //
NG0149:216: 'phrul dga'i tshul te tha dad min //
NG0149:217: gzhan dang ma byin med pa'i phyir //
NG0149:218: blangs med thams cad nyid kyi dbyings //
NG0149:219: chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu la //
NG0149:220: ming dang tshig tu btags pa rdzun //
NG0149:221: rdzun nyid la ni brdzun spyod pa //
NG0149:222: rdzun zhes btags tsam yod ma yin //
NG0149:223: ma chags pa la chags pa dang *//
NG0149:224: chags pa nyid na chags pa med //
NG0149:225: de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po ste //
NG0149:226: shin tu chags pa chen po yin //
NG0149:227: bla med mi spang bla ma bkur //
NG0149:228: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad //
NG0149:229: yang dag lam du zhugs la byams //
NG0149:230: gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya //
NG0149:231: 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te //
NG0149:232: bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog / gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang *//
NG0149:233: nga rgyal phrag dog mi spong ngo *//
NG0149:234: dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen //
NG0149:235: dag pa'i snod chu mi dor ro //
NG0149:236: yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste //
NG0149:237: ye nas dag mnyam rtogs par spyad //
NG0149:238: bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig la //
NG0149:239: rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur //
NG0149:240: mi spang mi dor lnga gnyis ni //
NG0149:242: mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yi //
NG0149:243: mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na //
NG0149:244: mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas //
NG0149:245: 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no //
NG0149:246: rtsa ba nyams pa'i 'chal pa dag / gos la nye bar mi brtson dang *//
NG0149:247: skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed //
NG0149:248: nyams gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang *//
NG0149:249: rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NG0149:250: bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur //
NG0149:251: yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i //
NG0149:253: yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NG0149:254: 'bras bu med cing ngan song ltung *//
NG0149:255: dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che //
NG0149:256: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin //
NG0149:259: gcig la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum //
NG0149:260: yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la //
NG0149:261: gcig la'ang bcu phrag gnyis su dbye //
NG0149:262: dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che //
NG0149:263: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na //
NG0149:264: srid gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa //
NG0149:265: rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed spros //
NG0149:266: gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi / thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yis //
NG0149:267: sgrub med mchog dam ma lus 'grub //
NG0149:268: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / rgyal pa'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa de //
NG0149:270: dam pa'i mchog dang dam pa yis //
NG0149:271: sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlob //
NG0149:272: bde gshegs nyid kyi yul la zhugs //
NG0149:273: 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor //
NG0149:274: ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs //
NG0149:275: ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas 'dus //
NG0149:276: ma lus rnams dang lhun gyis grub //
NG0149:277: nyams na bskangs pas rdzogs pa dang *//
NG0149:278: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces brjod pas //
NG0149:279: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dus par gyur to //
NG0149:280: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
NG0149:281: las dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o //
NG0149:282: // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das
NG0149:283: dgyes pa chen po lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig
NG0149:284: byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
NG0149:285: la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di
NG0149:286: brjod do // e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog / 'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la //
NG0149:287: khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya //
NG0149:288: sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig / bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la //
NG0149:289: mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya //
NG0149:290: bkug nas rdo rje phur bus gdab //
NG0149:291: rdul du byas la tshogs la dbul //
NG0149:292: e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog / lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas //
NG0149:293: bcings gyur bskyod nas phyogs bcur g.yos //
NG0149:295: bam gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog / 'bar ba gzi brjid lhun chen la //
NG0149:296: chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya //
NG0149:297: rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur //
NG0149:298: bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la //
NG0149:299: mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya //
NG0149:300: rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab //
NG0149:301: chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul //
NG0149:302: bam gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NG0149:303: lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdams //
NG0149:306: ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog / 'bar ba 'du 'phro gzi chen la //
NG0149:307: dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya //
NG0149:308: yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
NG0149:309: bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la //
NG0149:310: mtshan ma ming dang bcas pa bya //
NG0149:311: yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtags //
NG0149:312: nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pa gdab //
NG0149:313: rdo rje'i gzi chen 'phel bar dbul //
NG0149:316: lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams bskyod //
NG0149:318: yid bzhin nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur //
NG0149:319: ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog / gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la //
NG0149:320: dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya //
NG0149:321: gtum chen rngam pa'ang lhan ner 'gyur //
NG0149:322: bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la //
NG0149:323: gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag / lhan ner gsal ba'i phur bus gdab //
NG0149:324: 'bar ba lhan ne'i tshogs la dbul //
NG0149:325: ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NG0149:326: lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas //
NG0149:327: 'bar ba lhan ne'i byin gyis khyab /
NG0149:328: thams cad g.yo ba med par byed //
NG0149:329: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
NG0149:330: lhag ma'i mchod sbyin 'dod pa sbyin //
NG0149:331: rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrags nas /
NG0149:332: gang 'dod las de byed par bsgo //
NG0149:333: sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka / shin tu gdug cing gtum bag can //
NG0149:334: thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i //
NG0149:335: dbang dang byin rlabs rmad po che //
NG0149:336: lha chen la sogs dbang du bsdus //
NG0149:337: 'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas //
NG0149:338: so so'i las rnams bskos pa de //
NG0149:339: ji ltar dam bcas khas blangs pa'i //
NG0149:340: ma thogs myur du mngon par phyung *//
NG0149:341: dam bcas bzhin du ma byas na //
NG0149:342: ji ltar dam bcas mna' bor ba'i //
NG0149:344: dam tshig de las 'das gyur na //
NG0149:345: mgo lus snying yang tshal pa bdun //
NG0149:348: ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos //
NG0149:349: las de mngon du ma byas na //
NG0149:350: rang gis mna' bor khas blangs bzhin //
NG0149:351: rul myags tshigs nas dmyal bar 'gro //
NG0149:352: rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i //
NG0149:353: las rnams yongs su bya ba dang */
NG0149:354: 'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyong *//
NG0149:355: phra men ma yang dngos grub 'thob //
NG0149:356: bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos //
NG0149:358: khro bo sgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo ni 'di yin no /
NG0149:359: khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i //
NG0149:360: bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni //
NG0149:361: thams cad thams cad ci 'dod pa //
NG0149:362: thams cad thams cad byed pa yin //
NG0149:363: mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs pa'i //
NG0149:364: bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni //
NG0149:367: spos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i //
NG0149:368: bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni //
NG0149:369: lhan ner 'dod na lhan ner byed //
NG0149:370: rmugs par 'dod na rmugs par byed //
NG0149:371: seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i //
NG0149:372: bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni //
NG0149:373: thams cad kun la za bar byed //
NG0149:374: rdul cha tsam yang med par byed //
NG0149:375: bzhad gdod chen mo la sogs pa'i //
NG0149:376: bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni //
NG0149:377: thams cad ma lus 'byin par byed //
NG0149:378: kun la rab tu nyams par byed //
NG0149:379: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
NG0149:380: bro gar glu tshig chen mos @#//
NG0149:382: rbad cing gtang bar bya ba ste //
NG0149:383: thams cad thams cad byed pa yin //
NG0149:384: ljon pa dang ni lcug phran tshal //
NG0149:385: sdong gcig dang ni me reg drung *//
NG0149:386: dang bas dga' ba chags pa dang */
NG0149:387: khros pas ka li rab tu bya //
NG0149:389: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyong bar gyur to //
NG0149:390: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
NG0149:391: las lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las byin gyis rlob
NG0149:392: pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o ///
NG0149:393: / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i
NG0149:394: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu rngam pa'i mdangs
NG0149:396: hum gtum chen dus mtha'i me chen 'bar //
NG0149:398: khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin //
NG0149:399: mche ba zangs yag za byed che hoh //
NG0149:400: hum rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir //
NG0149:401: gtum chen ri rab 'bum bsnyil skad //
NG0149:402: a la ha la'i gad rgyangs che //
NG0149:403: skyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che hoh //
NG0149:404: hum khro bo'i shes rab 'od po che //
NG0149:405: ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal //
NG0149:407: sna tshogs ye shes thig le che hoh //
NG0149:408: hum khro bo rgyal po sprin chen po //
NG0149:411: sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che hoh //
NG0149:412: hum bdud kun gyi ni bdag chen po //
NG0149:413: bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms //
NG0149:415: 'jigs byed chen po thig le che hoh //
NG0149:416: hum rdo rje brag chen sra ba po //
NG0149:417: rdo rje chu bo sdud chen po //
NG0149:418: rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che //
NG0149:419: rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che hoh //
NG0149:420: zhes ched du glu blangs so //
NG0149:421: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
NG0149:422: las khro bo la bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu
NG0149:423: gcig pa'o // // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes
NG0149:424: pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang
NG0149:425: sngags kyi rgyal po brtan par gzung ba 'di ched
NG0149:426: du brjod do // kye kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'di //
NG0149:427: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid //
NG0149:429: rnam rtog zhags pas so sor 'dzin //
NG0149:430: sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang *//
NG0149:431: gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam //
NG0149:432: ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byams kyis //
NG0149:433: don du mi 'gyur yongs ma gsungs //
NG0149:434: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
NG0149:435: phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di //
NG0149:436: rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa //
NG0149:437: de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs //
NG0149:438: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la //
NG0149:439: gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga' //
NG0149:440: sgro dang skur pa zhi ba yi //
NG0149:441: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na //
NG0149:442: nyid de nges pa'i dbyings nas phyung *//
NG0149:443: de ni nges par lung bstan te //
NG0149:444: sras ni thugs las skyes pa yin //
NG0149:445: sa rab rigs pa 'dzin la gnas //
NG0149:448: gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings /
NG0149:449: sku gsung thugs lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so //
NG0149:450: 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba
NG0149:451: le'u stong phrag brgya pa las mtshan nyid dang rgyud
NG0149:452: thams cad kyi lung gi spyi de bzhin gshegs pa
NG0149:453: thams cad kyi gsang ba gsang ba'i snying po de
NG0149:454: kho nyid nges pa las thams cad ma lus par
NG0149:455: 'phros te 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras
NG0149:456: bu'i mchog g.yung ti ka na rdzogs so zhes pa
NG0149:457: re zhig rong zom zin pa la dgongs pa 'dra'o
NG0149:458: // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges
NG0149:459: pa las mnyes pa dang yongs su gzung ba'i le'u
NG0149:461: /   ! na mah shri gu ra be rat+na tra ya ya //
NG0149:462: bsil ldan 'di na sde snod 'dzin rnams kyi //
NG0149:463: nang na rgyu skar rgyal po gang ba ltar //
NG0149:464: kun nas thal le rab tu gsal ba yi //
NG0149:465: mkhas chen bcom ldan ral gri rgyal gyur cig / spyan sngar zhu ba /
NG0149:466: dpal gsang ba snying po'i rgyud kyi rgya dpe bris la bskur gsungs pa la /
NG0149:467: dpe de ta la'i lo ma la yi ge wa rtu+u la shin tu legs pa bris pa /
NG0149:470: le'u dgu pa'i stod nas ta la'i byang bu gcig kyang chad /
NG0149:471: mjug kyang ma rdzogs pa zhig gda' //
NG0149:472: 'on kyang le'u nyi shus rdzogs nas ma 'gyur pa le'u gnyis rdzogs su nye ba zhig gda' /
NG0149:473: des kyang ji tsam rdzogs ma 'tshal /
NG0149:474: gnyis po 'di la 'bru thug bgyis na cung zad go'am snyam par gda' ste ma bgyis /
NG0149:475: 'ga' zhig la cung zad bgyis pa 'di dag la
NG0149:476: yang nor ba mchis pas de rnams legs par 'chos
NG0149:477: pa dang */ 'di gnyis legs par bsgyur ba yang zhu /
NG0149:478: gzhan mtshams sbyor ma byas pa dang */
NG0149:479: tshigs bcad la shad ma bris pa rnams rgya dpe
NG0149:480: la ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin bris pa legs so
NG0149:482: rgyud kun snying po dpal ldan 'dus pa dang *//
NG0149:483: dbyer med rgyud chen 'di lta bu dang gzhan //
NG0149:484: zab mo'i rgyud dang theg chen chos rnams dang *//
NG0149:485: mjal nas tshul bzhin sgrub pa byed par shog //
NG0149:487: gnas gtsang steng gi 'og min nyams dga' bar //
NG0149:488: kun bzang rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i bka' //
NG0149:489: rgyud rgyal gsang snying rgya dpe ma rnyed pas //
NG0149:490: bod kyis byas zhes gangs ri'i khrod 'dir grags //
NG0149:491: bcom ldan ral gri rgya dpe legs btsal nas //
NG0149:492: gzhung 'di 'dzin pa'i sngags 'chang rnams la bstan //
NG0149:493: pan chen bi shwa mi tra la sogs pa'i //
NG0149:494: gzhung gi sgrub byed gsang snying sgrub par ltos //
NG0149:495: sngon gyi lo pan mang gzigs blo gros can //
NG0149:496: rgya bod gnyis su mkhas la legs sbyangs pas //
NG0149:497: dpe 'di ma rnyed yid bzhin rin chen 'dra //
NG0149:498: rgyud 'dir 'jug pa'i mun sel nyi ma yin //
NG0149:501: phyi ma'i rgyud dang mthun pa'i 'grel pa mdzad //
NG0149:502: 'di gnyis spangs nas rang gar 'chad pa rnams //
NG0149:503: shes rab 'chal pa nor ba'i 'phreng ba yin //
NG0149:504: rna ring 'chong drug spyad gzhung ma mthong bas //
NG0149:505: 'chong drug gzhung mtshams shes pa med ces grags //
NG0149:506: 'chong drug shes par 'dod pa'i blo gsal rnams //
NG0149:507: gzur gnas blo yis kho bo'i drung du byon //
NG0149:509: chos kyi rgyal po bcom ldan ral gri'i phyag dpe
NG0149:510: la gtugs shing bris so // // mang+ga lam //
NG0149:511: ! gsang snying rgya dpe'i 'gyur byang bzhugs so //
NG0149:513: phun sum tshogs dpal thugs kyi gsang ba'i mdzod //
NG0149:514: theg pa'i bcud 'dus man ngag snying po'i dbyings //
NG0149:515: ma nor gsal byed gzhan min de kho na //
NG0149:516: rang nyid ngo bos nges pa'i don la 'dud //
NG0149:517: rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba rtsa ba'i
NG0149:518: rgyud dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid
NG0149:520: o rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma sam b+ha wa dang */
NG0149:521: cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur dang */
NG0149:522: pan+di ta bi shwa mi tra dang */
NG0149:523: lots+tsha ba pa gor bai ro tsa na'i 'gyur dang */
NG0149:524: pan+di ta bi ma la mi tra dang */
NG0149:525: lo ts+tsha ba rma rin chen mchog gi 'gyur yod ces grags na'ang */
NG0149:526: deng sang gi dpe rnams kyi mjug na lo pan
NG0149:527: 'di dang 'dis bsgyur ces pa'i mtshan bkod pa ni
NG0149:528: mi 'dug mod / des na'ang rgyud kyi tshig don
NG0149:529: legs par khong du chud cing mkhas grub brnyes pa'i
NG0149:530: lo pan ches che ba zhig gis bsgyur bar kho
NG0149:531: mi 'dug mod / rtogs so // 'dir rgya gar gyi dpe rnyed pa'i tshul ni /
NG0149:532: mkhas pa'i dbang phyug dam pa bcom ldan ral gris /
NG0149:533: nyi 'od seng ge'i rgya cher 'grel dang */
NG0149:534: bi shwa mi tra'i 'grel chen dang */
NG0149:535: sangs rgyas gsang ba'i rnam dbye 'grel dang */
NG0149:537: sgeg pa rdo rje'i 'grel pa par khabs dang */
NG0149:538: bi ma la'i 'grel chung pi na ta ra ta dang */
NG0149:539: tish+ta ma ti'i ber ka 'grel dang */
NG0149:540: gzhan yang rong zom chos kyi bzang po'i dkon cog 'grel rnams gzigs pa dang */
NG0149:541: khyad par dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa pan+di ta bi shwa mi tras mdzad par /
NG0149:542: rgyud 'di'i khungs mang du drangs pa gzigs pas /
NG0149:543: rtsad gcod pas rkyen byas nas kun la yang yang du glengs pas /
NG0149:544: nam zhig bod yul dbus kyi sa cha bzang dang nye ba na /
NG0149:545: mi mgar ba seng ge 'od kyi slob brgyud sngags
NG0149:546: pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rta ston pa zhes grags
NG0149:548: gsang ba snying po'i rgya dpe bsam yas na bdag
NG0149:549: gi zhang po sngags pa zhig la 'dug ces glengs
NG0149:550: pa la / de'i rgyu mtshan dris pas /
NG0149:551: rtse lngar 'gro zer ba'i a tsa ra bod skad
NG0149:552: kyang cha tsam shes pa 'ga' zhig lha sa nas
NG0149:553: byung gda' ste / bsam yas su re zhig bsdad
NG0149:554: nas dbu rtse'i rgya dpe rnams la blta zhing 'dug
NG0149:555: byung gda' ste / pas / bdag gi zhang pos ci 'dug ces dris pas /
NG0149:556: pa'o /// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes
NG0149:559: bod kyi skad du gsang ba snying po zhes bya bar 'gro'am zer bas /
NG0149:560: gsang ba snying po'i rgya dpe yin nges snyam nas yi dam du bzung bdog ces zhus pas /
NG0149:561: de ma thag par long zhig par bsgos shing */
NG0149:562: des kyang rings pa'i tshul gyis blangs te phul pas gzigs te mnyes shing */
NG0149:563: rgya dpe ta la'i lo ma la yi ge wa
NG0149:564: rtu+u la shin tu legs par bris pa sngon rgyal
NG0149:565: po snga dar gyi dus su byon pas /
NG0149:566: rnyings pas yig 'bru la la zubs shing */
NG0149:567: le'u dgu pa'i stod nas ta la'i byang bu gcig chad pa /
NG0149:568: mjug le'u nyi shu pa rdzogs su nye ba nas kyang ma tshang ba zhig 'dug pas /
NG0149:569: ches cher mnyes pa chen po thob ste /
NG0149:570: slar yang rgya dpe yar 'brog pa sha gang lots+tsha ba shes rab bzang po zhes grags pa /
NG0149:571: sngar gyi sbyangs pa'i sa bon sad pa /
NG0149:572: tshe 'dir lots+tsha'i tshul 'bad pa chung ngus shes pa
NG0149:573: zhig byung ba de la sngon gyi rgya dpe 'di
NG0149:574: 'dug pas 'bru len gyi sa la bskur zhes bsgos
NG0149:575: shing */ des kyang ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin bris /
NG0149:577: phyi mo'i gnas la mi gsal ba rnams bu dper yang de ltar btab /
NG0149:578: brda sprad cing grub pa dang */
NG0149:579: na mah shri gu+u ra we rat+na tra ya ya /
NG0149:580: bsil ldan 'di na sde snod 'dzin rnams kyi //
NG0149:581: nang na rgyu skar rgyal po gang ba ltar //
NG0149:582: kun nas thal le rab tu gsal ba yi //
NG0149:583: mkhas mchog bcom ldan ral gri rgyal gyur cig / spyan sngar zhu ba /
NG0149:584: dpal gsang ba snying po'i rgya dpe 'dra len du gyis la bris la bskur gsungs pa la /
NG0149:586: mtshams sbyor ma byas pa dang */
NG0149:587: tshigs bcad la shad ma bris pa rnams rgya dpe
NG0149:588: na ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin bris pa lags shing
NG0149:589: */ snga 'gyur dang 'bru thug bgyis na zubs pa rnams go'am snyam pa gda' ste ma bgyis /
NG0149:590: dang zhus kyang dag par bgyis lags shing */
NG0149:591: sgro skur bsal phyir kun la spel ba zhu /
NG0149:592: rgyud kun snying po dpal ldan 'dus pa dang */
NG0149:593: dbyer med rgyud chen 'di lta bu dang gzhan /
NG0149:594: zab mo'i chos dang theg chen chos rnams la //
NG0149:595: mjal nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa byed par shog /
NG0149:596: ces pa'i zhu yig dang rgya dpe bcom ldan pa'i
NG0149:598: bcom ldan pas gang gi tshe sngags pa'i dge ba'i
NG0149:599: bshes gnyen mang po shab jo mo lha khang du
NG0149:602: 'di rigs 'dzin chen po pad+ma sam b+ha wa'i phyag dper 'dug cing */
NG0149:603: rgyud rnam dag yin pa'i rgyu mtshan dang bcas te bsnyad pas /
NG0149:604: khong rnams na re bod na rgyud 'di la da
NG0149:0: (11)@#// rje ro langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang */
NG0149:605: lta rgya dpe yod dam med kyang rung gi kho
NG0149:606: bo cag rnams la ni sngar nas kyang som nyi
NG0149:607: med zer ro // de nas ring zhig lon pa'i tshe /
NG0149:608: byang ri pa shes rab rgya mtshos rgya dpe de bcom ldan pa'i phyag nas zhus /
NG0149:609: thar ba lots+tsha ba'i drung du phyin te /
NG0149:612: rgya dpe'i nang na mang nyung la sogs pa'i dregs yod par 'dug pa dang */
NG0149:613: 'chong drug gi the tshom bsal ba'i phyir khyed kyis
NG0149:614: kyang bsgyur bar zhu zhes bskul ba la brten nas
NG0149:616: sangs rgyas gsang ba'i 'grel pa dang */
NG0149:617: sgeg pa rdo rje'i 'grel pa dang */
NG0149:618: snga 'gyur rnams dpang por byas nas /
NG0149:619: snga 'gyur na med cing rgya dpe 'di na yod pa thams cad bsgyur /
NG0149:620: 'dir byung 'thad cing snga 'gyur na yod pa'i tshig ci rigs rnams snga 'gyur bzhin bris /
NG0149:621: snga 'gyur snga phyi nas ring po nas bsgyur te /
NG0149:622: bsgyur ba rnams kho bos rgya dpe ltar bkod do //
NG0149:624: bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni /
NG0149:629: dper na de bzhin sbrid sangs bzhin //
NG0149:632: so so thig le de nyid la //
NG0149:635: 'bar ba'i khro bo mang po 'khrug ces dang */
NG0149:637: de bzhin gshegs thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas zhes dang */
NG0149:638: yang 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po zhes pa nas /
NG0149:639: 'bras bu'i mchog gi bar rgya dpe 'di na mi snang la /
NG0149:640: le'u dgu pa'i 'go nas de nas slob ma gzhug par bya //
NG0149:641: zhes pa'i rgya dpe byang bu gcig chad pa'ang 'gyur rnying las bas bas pa yin no //
NG0149:642: yang rgya dpe 'di'i le'u bzhi par /
NG0149:643: rgya gar gyi yi ge lnga bcu dang */
NG0149:644: de dag gi don bshad kyang tshang bar byung ba dang */
NG0149:645: bco lnga par mjug bsdu pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga byung ba dang */
NG0149:646: 'chong drug kyang rgya dpe 'di nas tshang bar byung zhing */
NG0149:647: rgya 'grel nyi 'od la sogs par ma byung bas /
NG0149:648: rgya dpe la yang rgyas bsdus gnyis su yod par gsal zhing */
NG0149:649: bod du dpe mkhyud byas zhes pa mi bden cing */
NG0149:650: gzhung rgyas bsdus bstan pa yin no //
NG0149:651: de bas na gzu lums dang */
NG0149:653: mun sprul la sogs pa 'khor ba'i rgyu rnams spangs
NG0149:654: nas bsam pa rnam par dag pas bsgyur ba yin
NG0149:655: te / de bas mtho ba la phrag dog dang */
NG0149:657: dman pa la brnyas pa la sogs pa'i blo spangs te /
NG0149:658: kho bos 'gyur 'di la bltas na tshig don gyi
NG0149:659: cha 'ga' zhig la phan par 'gyur srid pas blo
NG0149:660: gsal zhing gzu bor gnas pa rnams kyis 'dri ba
NG0149:664: kun chub par mdzad pa zhu /
NG0149:665: dpal gsang ba snying po'i de kho na nyid nges pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'di /
NG0149:666: byang ri pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen shes rab rgya mtshos bskul ba'i ngor /
NG0149:667: mang du thos pa'i lots+tsha ba gnas brtan nyi ma
NG0149:668: rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos thar pa'i gling du bsgyur
NG0149:669: te legs par gtan la phab pa'o ///
NG0149:670: / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rnam par nges pa'i rgyud @#//
NG0149:672: chen po'i chen po kun tu bzang po'i gsung mchog zab mo 'di //
NG0149:673: 'di nyid ston pa dgyes pas ched du brjod cing brjod pas gsungs //
NG0149:674: gsung bzhin gsung rab kun gyi mchog gyur 'di ni 'og min du //
NG0149:675: dang po bstan nas slar yang gsang 'dzin gsang ba'i bdag po'i mthus //
NG0149:676: in+d+ra b+hu ti ku ku ra dza 'byor pa'i dbang po mgo mas //
NG0149:677: pho brang dam pa o d+yan gnas su chos 'di'i dbu brnyes shing *//
NG0149:678: ku ku ra dzas tan tra bco brgyad legs par bkrol nas ni //
NG0149:679: slar yang gangs ri'i khrod 'dir lha sras khri srong lde'u btsan dus //
NG0149:680: pad+ma dri med bshes gnyen la sogs dar bar mdzad //
NG0149:681: de nas ring zhig lon pa'i dus na rgya dpe 'di /
NG0149:682: mang thos bcom ldan ral gris brtson pa chen pos rnyed //
NG0149:683: de yi phyag dpe shes rab rgya mtshos gus pas zhus nas ni //
NG0149:684: bsgyur ces bskul nas kho bos tshul 'di legs par bsgyur //
NG0149:685: de las byung ba'i dge bas sangs rgyas dge ba'i chos //
NG0149:686: sa mchog rigs 'dzin dbang po ster ba'i lam gcig pu //
NG0149:687: zhi khro rab 'byams 'phrin las rnam bzhi 'byung ba'i gnas //
NG0149:688: ya mtshan cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gsang sngags dpal //
NG0149:689: dpal 'di yi ni don rtogs dpal mchog kun du bzang po yi //
NG0149:690: sa la 'dzegs nas sa mchog dbang po'i gnas thob nas //
NG0149:691: sa 'og sa steng sa bla'i 'gro ba thams cad la //
NG0149:692: sa bzhin skyo ba med pas yang yang smin byed shog //
NG0149:694: gsang sngags snga 'gyur sgyu 'phrul drwa ba yi //
NG0149:695: rgyud rgyal dpal ldan gsang ba snying po 'di //
NG0149:696: 'dzin pa'i sngags 'chang rnams la bka' nyid du //
NG0149:697: rtsod pa med mod 'on kyang snga dus su //
NG0149:698: skad gnyis smra ba lhas btsas la sogs pas /
NG0149:699: zur pa'i sar chos slob bcu byon pas g.yog bcol ba'i snying nang yin par grags //
NG0149:700: skyon bzhi yod ces rgya dpe ma mthong phyir //
NG0149:701: bod kyis byas zhes gangs can 'dir bsgrags pas //
NG0149:702: mkhas rlom 'ga' yang the tshom gnas su gyur //
NG0149:703: dus phyis gangs ri'i khrod 'drir mkhas pa'i mchog / zab dang rgya che'i gsung rab rnam 'byed cing *//
NG0149:704: bstan pa'i khur 'dzin mkhas pa'i 'dun sa na //
NG0149:705: rgyal mtshan ltar mtho dpal ldan ral gri yis //
NG0149:706: rgya dpe legs rnyed rtsod bral nyi zla ltar //
NG0149:707: kun la gsal mdzad gtsug gi rgyan du mchod //
NG0149:708: ma nges bskyar nas skyon bzhi'i gegs sel pa //
NG0149:709: dpal ldan gsang ba'i snying po sgrub pa'ang mdzad //
NG0149:710: de phy-ir 'di na rtog ge smra ba rnams //
NG0149:711: don la spyod pa'i blo gros ring byas nas //
NG0149:712: gsang snying bod kyis byas zhes bsgrags pa rnams //
NG0149:713: chu rlabs bzhin du ngal ba don med gyur //
NG0149:714: de rjes skad gnyis smra ba mkhyen pa'i dpal //
NG0149:715: blo gros nyi ma gnas lnga'i 'od zer can //
NG0149:716: brtul zhugs rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa nor bus @#//
NG0149:718: 'dod dgu dpal 'byung bzang po'i mthu can la //
NG0149:719: gzhung 'di 'dzin pa bshes gnyen ma thogs pa //
NG0149:720: shakya'-i dge bsnyen pra dz+nya sa ga ras //
NG0149:721: lhag bsam dag pas rab bskul gsol btab nas //
NG0149:722: rgyud kun snying po 'di nyid bsgyur pa yin //
NG0149:723: 'di yi ched du bya ba 'gyur rnying la //
NG0149:724: sngon gyi 'gyur mdzad mkhas grub brnyes pa'o //
NG0149:725: gzhan phan byams brtse'i thugs ldan de dag gis //
NG0149:726: don 'gyur gtsor mdzad rgya dpe 'di nyid dang *//
NG0149:727: mthun dang mi mthun bod skad dag mi dag / la la skad rnying gis bsgribs go ba dka' //
NG0149:728: dpe 'dir sngar med tshig dga' yod skyong zhing *//
NG0149:729: 'chong drug la sogs ji ltar nges dka' phyir //
NG0149:730: sgra bsgyur gtso byas gzhung 'di bsgyur mod kyi //
NG0149:731: 'on kyang snga 'gyur gzhung na mi bzhugs pa'i //
NG0149:733: de phyir rgya dpe rgyas bsdus shes par gyis //
NG0149:734: 'di 'dra'i tshul la mtshar du 'dzin par nges //
NG0149:735: rtog dpyod mi ldan kha cig 'di skad du //
NG0149:736: 'di la sngon chad sgro skur byung bas na //
NG0149:737: da lta rgya dpe yod dam med kyang rung *//
NG0149:738: snyigs dus skye bo som nyi sel dka' bas //
NG0149:739: gsar 'gyur 'bad pa'ang ngal ba don med de //
NG0149:740: 'di la 'chad nyan skyong ba'ang mi 'byung la //
NG0149:741: gzhan yang snga 'gyur gzhung gi tshig 'di la //
NG0149:742: 'di ltar bsgyur ces ga sha byed pa'ang srid //
NG0149:743: de dag phal cher gang zag rjes 'brang zhing *//
NG0149:744: thos pa'i nor bral chags sdang cher ma yis //
NG0149:745: blo mig lkugs pas nges don shes bya'i gsung *//
NG0149:746: ji bzhin lta bar mi nus kho nar zad //
NG0149:747: de'i phyir blo gsal rnams kyis rgyud 'di'i 'gyur //
NG0149:748: gsar rnying sdebs la gzur gnas blo yis spyod //
NG0149:749: bstan pa'i nyi ma phan bde'i 'od zer can //
NG0149:750: shar ri'i rtse nas nub ri'i sa 'dzin rtser //
NG0149:751: nye ba'i dus 'dir 'di 'dra'i rgyud zab mo //
NG0149:752: 'chad nyan bsgom par brtson pa de dag gi / bsod nams tshad kyis gzung bar mi nus pas //
NG0149:753: tshig don mkhas pas gzhan la'ang bsnyad par bya'o //
NG0149:754: de ltar rnam dag gsal bas rab snyam dge ba'i shes bya kun //
NG0149:755: kun nas gzigs pa'i spyan yangs rgyal ba'i spyi gzugs
NG0149:756: rigs rnams kun gyi bdag / bdag gzhan 'gro bas
NG0149:757: myur thob bde gshegs kun gyi thugs rje'i bcud //
NG0149:758: gsang bcud ma nor nges pa'i bka' 'di rab ston
NG0149:759: zhi ba'ang bskul bar shog / kun kyang lam 'dis
NG0149:760: grol gyur cig / thar pa lotsa ba'i 'gyur byang
NG0149:761: ngo *// // rang sems dag pa'i 'og min zhing
NG0149:762: khams su // rang rig dpal ldan khyab bdag rdo rje sems //
NG0149:763: ye shes lnga mdangs shel la 'ja' tshon bzhin //
NG0149:764: ma 'dres gsal bar 'char ba'i dkyil 'khor cher /
NG0149:765: 1 / ston pa'i dgongs pas yongs bstan rgyud kyi
NG0149:766: rgyal // rigs 'dzin brda las 'ongs te rgyal po dza'i /
NG0149:769: rim byon 'phags bod las ldan rnams kyi rnyed /
NG0149:770: 2 / rgyal dbang pad+mas sgra las rab bsgyur cing
NG0149:771: *// dri med bshes gnyen la brten gnyags dang rmas //
NG0149:772: zhus chen legs mdzad sgyu 'phrul rtsa ba'i rgyud //
NG0149:773: nges gsang theg pa rim bdun yang rtser son /
NG0149:774: 3 / dkar chags 'phang thang ma dang ldan dkar
NG0149:775: du // gsang sngags nang gi rgyud rnams ches gnyen pas //
NG0149:776: 'god par ma lus zhes pa snga 'gyur gyi //
NG0149:777: rgyud las ngos 'dzin gzhan pa bya rgyus dbul /
NG0149:778: 4 / thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po
NG0149:779: ches // la lar zhus dag mdzad bzhed re zhig par //
NG0149:780: btang snyoms bzhag las gnyis med rnam rgyal zhes //
NG0149:781: brdzus ma'i rgyud bzhin kun mkhyen bu'i 'gyur gsar kyi
NG0149:782: gnyis med rnam rgyal ma tshang ba de bsgyur ba'i
NG0149:783: rgyu mtshan gnyis med rnam rgyal brdzus ma 'di rgyud
NG0149:784: min pa shes pa'i dgos pa yod tshul gsungs pas
NG0149:785: so // nges par dbyung ba min / 5 / sa lo nyin mor byed pas gangs ljongs kyi //
NG0149:786: chos log mun pa mthar skrod sdom gsum du //
NG0149:787: gsang chen rnying ma'i chos rnams btang snyoms las //
NG0149:788: phyag rgya ba bzhin 'bad pas bkag pa med /
NG0149:789: 6 / mkhas pa'i rtser son rig ral thar lo
NG0149:790: sogs // chos kyi spyan ldan gzur gnas mkhas mang pos //
NG0149:791: rgya dpe rnyed nas cher bsngags 'gyur bcos rnams //
NG0149:792: bstan la gces 'dzin thugs kyis 'bad pas mdzad /
NG0149:793: 7 / g.yag zhar rtswa ltar phyogs rer ma gyur
NG0149:794: pa'i // thub bstan yongs rdzogs yid bzang rtser ba yis //
NG0149:795: sgrol chen drin las kho bos chos spong gi /
NG0149:796: sgrub pas ma sbags zhes gsung dgyes rtse son /
NG0149:797: 8 / rdo rje 'chang dbang dpal 'byor lhun grub
NG0149:798: kyis // rgyud 'di'i bshad bka' yab la nyer gsan nas //
NG0149:799: rgya cher spel mdzad theg pa mchog gi bstan //
NG0149:800: mi nub ring por gnas pa'i sraug shing gyur /
NG0149:801: 9 / yid srubs mda' yis snying ga phug min
NG0149:802: pa // bzang po'i bag chags sad pa'i blo ldan la //
NG0149:803: phan phyir par gyi chos sbyin 'di spel ba'i //
NG0149:804: srung ma legs ldan tshogs kyi bdag pos mdzod /
NG0149:805: 10 / phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kun 'byung
NG0149:806: gnas // tshogs bsags sgrib sbyangs byas min gdod ma nas //
NG0149:807: lus can yongs la lhun grub kun tu bzang *//
NG0149:808: rang zhal rang ngo 'phrod par bdag byin rlobs /
NG0149:809: 11 zhes theg pa mchog gi bstan pa'i btsas su
NG0149:810: sgyu 'phrul rtsa rgyud dga' ldan phun tshogs gling du
NG0149:812: za hor gyi ban+des sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chang khyim pa ngag dbang mkhyen brtse'o ///
NG0149:813: / de ltar rdo rje 'chang ba bod kha ba'i
NG0149:814: byin rlabs snying la zhugs shing khyab bdag zur chen
NG0149:815: dang khra tshangs pa rnam gnyis kyis smin grol gyi
NG0149:816: rim pa stsal bas chos spong gi sgrib pas spags
NG0149:817: par ma gyur pa'i bka' drin byang chub snying po'i
NG0149:818: @#// mtha' can du gzhal bar ma nus pa ni
NG0149:819: kun bzang gdod ma'i ye shes mngon du gyur nas
NG0149:820: kyang mjal bar spro ba yin no //
NG0149:821: rgyud kyi rgyal po 'd-i'i par snga sor bskrun par
NG0149:822: yig nor sogs kyi ma dag pa 'ga' zhig byung
NG0149:823: ba sngags rnams rgya dpe la brten nas khrus khang
NG0149:824: lo tsa ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sdes zhus dag
NG0149:825: nan tan mdzad pa'i dpe khungs btsun dang */
NG0149:826: bod skad la rgya 'grel par bkab /
NG0149:827: bod 'grel g.yung tika gnyis la legs par gtugs nas /
NG0149:828: rdo rje brag sprul pa'i sku mchog / 'dar pa lo tsa ba ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub /
NG0149:829: rnam gling pan chen dkon mchog chos grags gsum gyis
NG0149:830: zhus dag bgyis skabs dogs gnas rnams 'di gar mig
